alert.note: Alert for Green; Hart; Larue; Nelson; Taylor (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 2:14PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Nelson, northwestern Green, southern Larue, northeastern Hart and northwestern Taylor Counties through 245 PM EST/145 PM CST/... At 213 PM EST/113 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Hodgenville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Hart, northwestern Taylor, south central Nelson, southern Larue and northwestern Green Counties, including the following locations... Boundary Oak, Howardstown, Wabash, Bloyd, Bonnieville, Vento, White Rose, Hammonville, Tanner and New Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
